attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Change from manslaughter to murder 2 for all violent robberies.
Have mandatory sentencing 10 years minimum.
And to have transparent sentencing (you serve what you get)
To serve as a efficient deterrent

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Review the guidelines on manslaughter."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18389


Prime Minister's Office
